comments.signal_type: Either 'cc' or 'es' - determines which signal folder to use
comments.inputFolder: Folder containing signal _tps.root files (will be auto-determined from signal_type if not specified)
comments.around_vertex_only: If true, only add background TPs within vertex_radius cm of the neutrino vertex
comments.vertex_radius: Radius in cm around vertex to add backgrounds (only used if around_vertex_only=true)
comments.max_files: Maximum number of signal files to process (-1 for unlimited)
